summary: Tested Cocktails feature and Pantry enhancements. All 12 backend tests pass. Frontend UI tests pass. Cocktails page shows filter buttons (All/Alcoholic/Non-Alcoholic), Add Recipe page has meal/cocktail toggle with alcoholic checkbox, Pantry page has Filter Low Stock, Select All, and Export to List functionality.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/cocktails returns empty array initially
Backend: GET /api/cocktails?alcoholic=true filters alcoholic cocktails
Backend: GET /api/cocktails?alcoholic=false filters non-alcoholic cocktails
Backend: POST /api/recipes creates cocktail with recipe_type='cocktail' and is_alcoholic=true
Backend: POST /api/recipes creates cocktail with recipe_type='cocktail' and is_alcoholic=false
Backend: GET /api/cocktails returns created cocktails
Backend: Alcoholic filter correctly excludes non-alcoholic cocktails
Backend: Non-alcoholic filter correctly excludes alcoholic cocktails
Backend: POST /api/shopping-list/add-items adds multiple items
Backend: POST /api/shopping-list/add-items does not duplicate existing items
Backend: POST /api/shopping-list/add-items sets recipe_source='Pantry Low Stock'
Frontend: Cocktails navigation link in header
Frontend: Cocktails page with All/Alcoholic/Non-Alcoholic filter buttons
Frontend: Add Cocktail button on Cocktails page
Frontend: Add Recipe page has Meal/Cocktail toggle
Frontend: 'Contains alcohol' checkbox appears when Cocktail is selected
Frontend: URL param ?type=cocktail auto-selects cocktail mode
Frontend: Pantry page has Filter Low Stock button
Frontend: Pantry page has Low Stock and All selection buttons
Frontend: Pantry page has Export to List button
Frontend: Pantry items have selection checkboxes
seed_data_creation: Created test user: test-user-cocktails-1770824861277 with session: test_session_cocktails_1770824861278. Test data cleaned up after tests.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Cocktails and Pantry enhancement features are fully working. Key endpoints: GET /api/cocktails (with ?alcoholic=true/false filter), POST /api/shopping-list/add-items. Frontend components: Cocktails.jsx, AddRecipe.jsx (with recipe type toggle), Pantry.jsx (with filter/select/export controls).

cocktails_endpoint.details: GET /api/cocktails returns cocktails filtered by recipe_type='cocktail'. Accepts ?alcoholic=true/false query param.

cocktails_filter.details: Alcoholic filter returns only is_alcoholic=true cocktails, non-alcoholic filter returns only is_alcoholic=false cocktails.

create_cocktail_recipe.details: POST /api/recipes accepts recipe_type='cocktail' and is_alcoholic=true/false fields.

add_items_to_shopping_list.details: POST /api/shopping-list/add-items adds multiple items, prevents duplicates, sets recipe_source='Pantry Low Stock'.

cocktails_page_ui.details: Cocktails page shows filter toggle (All/Alcoholic/Non-Alcoholic), search bar, Add Cocktail button, and cocktail cards.

add_recipe_cocktail_mode.details: Add Recipe page has Meal/Cocktail toggle. When Cocktail is selected, 'Contains alcohol' checkbox appears. URL param ?type=cocktail auto-selects cocktail mode.

pantry_filter_low_stock.details: Pantry page has 'Filter Low Stock' button that toggles to show only low stock items.

pantry_select_all.details: Pantry page has 'Low Stock' and 'All' selection buttons to select items for export.

pantry_export_to_list.details: Pantry page has 'Export to List' button that adds selected items to shopping list via POST /api/shopping-list/add-items.

pantry_item_checkboxes.details: Each pantry item has a checkbox for selection. Selected count is displayed.
